body_html:
@goldsborough Please have a look at this for x86. Your CI does not look like its running the cpp_extensions test because the docker container does not have ninja. Here is a log of one of the PR executions :

https://circleci.com/gh/pytorch/pytorch/192430?utm_campaign=vcs-integration-link&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github-build-link
Nov 06 22:18:42 Ninja is not available. Skipping C++ extensions test. Install ninja with 'pip install ninja' or 'conda install ninja'.
Nov 06 22:18:42 Running test_cpp_extensions ... [2018-11-06 22:18:42.199646]
Nov 06 22:18:42 Running test_c10d ... [2018-11-06 22:18:42.202386]

body:
@goldsborough Please have a look at this for x86.  Your CI does not look like its running the cpp_extensions test because the docker container does not have ninja.  Here is a log of one of the PR executions :  

https://circleci.com/gh/pytorch/pytorch/192430?utm_campaign=vcs-integration-link&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=github-build-link
Nov 06 22:18:42 Ninja is not available. Skipping C++ extensions test. Install ninja with 'pip install ninja' or 'conda install ninja'.
Nov 06 22:18:42 Running test_cpp_extensions ... [2018-11-06 22:18:42.199646]
Nov 06 22:18:42 Running test_c10d ... [2018-11-06 22:18:42.202386]
